content.title: Cilostazol in PAD
content.definition: Phosphodiesterase inhibitor improving claudication. Increases walking distance. Contraindicated in heart failure.
content.statement: Cilostazol in PAD is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Pad that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
